item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Harsh!

Welcome to my blog. This is my personal space where I document my journey, share my thoughts, and showcase my work.

Recent Projects

  • Project Alpha: A brief description of what this project is about and what technologies were used. Link to code
  • Project Beta: A brief description of what this project is about and what technologies were used. Link to code

  • Accomplishment #2
